concept.title: 219.270-1 Definition. As used in this section—

conbody.p: “Nonprofit organization” means any organization that is—
(1) Described in section 501(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986; and
(2) Exempt from tax under section 501(a) of that Code.
